titleInfo.title: [Map of Hamilton, showing Main Street and Emerald Street]

physicalDescription.note: 1 map ; sheet 48 x 34 cm. Map lined with archival paper on verso.

mods.note: Manuscript map. Cartographer unknown. "Top of Mountain" is written at the top of the sheet. Map is oriented with the north arrow pointing down. Streets appearing on the map include Main Street, Emerald Street, and Clarke Street [now Stinson Street]. There is a surveyed line delineated east of Emerald Street.
